title: ICE: Unexpected panic with mir-opt-level=3

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Compiling [`alloc-fmt`](https://crates.io/crates/alloc-fmt) v0.1.0 with `RUSTFLAGS='-Z mir-opt-level=3'` causes `rustc` to panic:

```text
$ RUST_BACKTRACE=1 RUSTFLAGS='-Z mir-opt-level=3' cargo build
...
error: internal compiler error: src/librustc_trans/mir/constant.rs:403: assignment to (_2.0: T) in constant

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports

note: rustc 1.23.0-nightly (79cfce3d3 2017-11-12) running on x86_64-apple-darwin

note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace

thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box<Any>', src/librustc_errors/lib.rs:432:8
note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace.
stack backtrace:
   0: std::sys::imp::backtrace::tracing::imp::unwind_backtrace
   1: std::sys_common::backtrace::_print
   2: std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}}
   3: std::panicking::default_hook
   4: std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook
   5: std::panicking::begin_panic
   6: _ZN5rustc7session16opt_span_bug_fmt28_$u7b$$u7b$closure$u7d$$u7d$17hee39e9190902a5d3E.llvm.2FF2FE55
   7: rustc::session::span_bug_fmt
   8: _ZN11rustc_trans3mir8constant15MirConstContext5store17h6869cc7056670610E.llvm.921193F4
   9: rustc_trans::mir::constant::MirConstContext::trans
  10: rustc_trans::mir::constant::MirConstContext::trans_def
  11: rustc_trans::mir::constant::MirConstContext::trans
  12: rustc_trans::mir::constant::MirConstContext::trans_def
  13: rustc_trans::consts::trans_static
  14: rustc_trans::trans_item::TransItemExt::define
  15: _ZN11rustc_trans4base20compile_codegen_unit17hf8e74fc334f6f01aE.llvm.919748FA
  16: rustc::ty::maps::<impl rustc::ty::maps::queries::compile_codegen_unit<'tcx>>::compute_result
  17: _ZN5rustc9dep_graph5graph8DepGraph14with_task_impl17hb291b51b0682dcdfE.llvm.1167D34C
  18: rustc_errors::Handler::track_diagnostics
  19: rustc::ty::maps::plumbing::<impl rustc::ty::context::TyCtxt<'a, 'gcx, 'tcx>>::cycle_check
  20: _ZN5rustc2ty4maps80_$LT$impl$u20$rustc..ty..maps..queries..compile_codegen_unit$LT$$u27$tcx$GT$$GT$5force17h7e55857937a8f6d2E.llvm.DE2A7FD8
  21: rustc::ty::maps::<impl rustc::ty::maps::queries::compile_codegen_unit<'tcx>>::try_get
  22: rustc::ty::maps::TyCtxtAt::compile_codegen_unit
  23: rustc::ty::maps::<impl rustc::ty::context::TyCtxt<'a, 'tcx, 'lcx>>::compile_codegen_unit
  24: rustc_trans::base::trans_crate
  25: <rustc_trans::LlvmTransCrate as rustc_trans_utils::trans_crate::TransCrate>::trans_crate
  26: rustc::util::common::time
  27: rustc_driver::driver::phase_4_translate_to_llvm
  28: _ZN12rustc_driver6driver13compile_input28_$u7b$$u7b$closure$u7d$$u7d$17h4c6dcb695ed7b609E.llvm.F091A0C4
  29: <std::thread::local::LocalKey<T>>::with
  30: <std::thread::local::LocalKey<T>>::with
  31: rustc::ty::context::TyCtxt::create_and_enter
  32: rustc_driver::driver::compile_input
  33: rustc_driver::run_compiler
```

## Meta

```text
$ rustc --version
rustc 1.23.0-nightly (79cfce3d3 2017-11-12)
```
